thread.title: Re: ‘Amazing’: NYT photog, Ivanka capture Donald Trump and his grandkids on the way to Mar-a-Lago
thread.title_full: Re: ‘Amazing’: NYT photog, Ivanka capture Donald Trump and his grandkids on the way to Mar-a-Lago

author: John
title: Re: ‘Amazing’: NYT photog, Ivanka capture Donald Trump and his grandkids on the way to Mar-a-Lago
text:
— Daniella Diaz (@DaniellaMicaela) February 17, 2017 Trending No she di'int! Jen Psaki lectures Kellyanne Conway, Sean Spicer on lying 
And here’s the president with Joseph and his older sister, Arabella: . @realDonaldTrump leaving the Oval Office with his grandchildren, Arabella and Joseph, en route Mar-a-lago in Palm Beach, FL. pic.twitter.com/c9eEq2wg3o 
— Stephen Crowley (@Stcrow) February 17, 2017 
Just another weekend with grandpa: . @realDonaldTrump boards Marine One with his grandchildren, Arabella and Joseph, en route Boeing Co in S Carolina; Mar-a-lago in FL. pic.twitter.com/iQnXHfd36p 
— Stephen Crowley (@Stcrow) February 17, 2017 
Ivanka added some adorable shots of her own: A post shared by Ivanka Trump (@ivankatrump) on Feb 17, 2017 at 7:10am PST A post shared by Ivanka Trump (@ivankatrump) on Feb 17, 2017 at 9:19am PST 
But before Florida and the 3-day-weekend, there was a short stop in South Carolina for a speech and tour of Boeing’s new 787 Dreamliner: 
— Dan Scavino Jr. (@Scavino45) February 17, 2017 
***
